attributes.action: Stop just the vaccine passport for night clubs and keep negative tests!
attributes.additional_details: Because it is discrimination and against are human rights and freedom your taking our freedom away and forcing people to have something they have a choice over which is wrong!!
attributes.background: Why do we have to discriminate against peoples Human rights and freedom to be forced to have a vaccine to go into a nightclub that’s not by law or venue it is discrimation against so many people and shouldn’t be allowed why can’t we keep negative tests and proof of immunity and vaccines to be fair!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Don't restrict admission to nightclubs to only vaccinated customers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592668

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
